text: Vítor Silva Duarte (born 31 August 1959) is a former Portuguese football player of Mozambican descent. He played 8 seasons and 200 games in the Primeira Liga, mostly with Braga and also with Beira-Mar, Farense and Benfica. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Primeira Liga for Benfica on 1 December 1985 as a late substitute in a 1–0 victory over Académica de Coimbra. ==References== ==External links== Category:1959 births Category:Portuguese people of Mozambican descent Category:Sportspeople from Maputo Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:S.L. title: Vítor Duarte
